trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The priggish taxonomist is desperately hoping for inspiration to strike.
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the priggish taxonomist at the base of the large tree to the south.
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_TODO_01<tab>/think at the base of the large tree.
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the priggish taxonomist at a waterfall to the west.
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_TODO_03<tab>/think with Euros 310.
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the priggish taxonomist.
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_EUROS310_000_015<tab>!!!
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_SYSTEM_000_016<tab>A creature bearing an uncanny resemblance to a cactuar appears to be in fine spirits.

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_001<tab>A name, a name... I need a name for it─one that will stand the test of time as it passes through generation after generation! When you break it down, what's in a name, really?

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_002<tab>Oh, hello. I didn't see you there. You're a familiar, I take it? Very good. But whose, I wonder...? Well, that's not important right now. You've ears enough to listen to my plight.

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_003<tab>I'm tasked with a job of great import: nomenclature. Currently, I find myself facing down a sort of creative blockage in regards to this fellow's name.

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_004<tab>This is a creature who has not only survived the vicious wilds of the Hungering Gardens, but has thrived in them thanks to its ossified spines. Thus it deserves a name befitting its rugged tenacity.

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_005<tab>Despite its singularly unique physical properties, its creator never bothered to refer to it as anything besides its designation: Euros 310. I cannot abide so uninspired a name for a creation as remarkable as this.

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_006<tab>But therein lies the rub─for all its captivating qualities, I've yet to hit upon a captivating name. I was just on my way to take a turn about the grounds to stimulate the creative juices, so to speak, but seeing you, I realize two heads may be better than one.
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_007<tab>So, what do you say? Would you care to join me in my walk?
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_Q1_000_000<tab>Will you join the taxonomist?
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_A1_000_001<tab>Sure.
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_A1_000_002<tab>No, thank you.

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_009<tab>Excellent. You, my quick-witted familiar friend, will be a boon indeed to my imagination. What say we take a quiet moment to cogitate beneath that large tree to the south of here?

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_010<tab>That is a pity indeed. Well, should you change your mind, do speak to me again, won't you? I reckon I shall be laboring over this conundrum for quite some time.

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_020<tab>Is not the sun-dappled forest floor a stunning sight? Is not the breeze so bracing as to lift the spirits? Is not the susurrus of the melanioi's whiskers so pleasant as to induce great thoughts?

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_021<tab>Surely, with all the inspiration that surrounds us, you have been stirred into contemplation, too. Tell me, what is it you now focus so squarely upon?
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_A2_000_001<tab>The innumerable tasks that sit waiting to be done.
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_A2_000_002<tab>Nothing that I can tell you about, I'm afraid.

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_023<tab>So, even familiars have their fair share of woes. Might I suggest you take this moment to relax, then? Simply let the winds wash over you, the rustle of the leaves play in your ears, and just...<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>think<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_024<tab>Unburden yourself of the troubles that seem to be weighing you down. Allow yourself to just be for a moment─to just <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>think<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_SYSTEM_000_026<tab>Euros 310 does as the taxonomist does, and falls into what appears to be deep, meditative thought.

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_SYSTEM_000_029<tab>Beneath the canopy of rustling leaves, time moves as if caught in treacle, providing you the perfect location to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>think<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> great thoughts.
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>For a time, all you can hear is the breeze, like a calming whisper in your ears... All of a sudden, a groan invades your peace of mind.

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_031<tab>Hmmm... <var 1A 02 /var>Hmmmmmm<var 1A 01 /var>... Created to survive in extreme weather conditions, whose adaptability is second to none... What would be a name suitable for such a creature?

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_032<tab>I can practically feel genius on the tip of my tongue, and yet...nothing comes. Oh bother, this won't do, now will it? I hate to ask, but would you accompany me awhile longer? Come, let's away to a westerly waterfall.
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_EUROS310_000_035<tab>!!!
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_SYSTEM_000_036<tab>Euros 310 seems to be enjoying the misty spray from the falls.

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_040<tab>Ah, listen close. Can you hear it? A waterfall whose stream is at once ferocious and tender, whose spray kisses its surroundings in an affectionate pitter-patter? Inspiring indeed, and like to give rise to brilliance!

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_041<tab>Yes, there is no place more perfect for the cogitation of this creature's name. Come. Stand with me and let us <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>think<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> on it.

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_042<tab>Is this not an inspiring location? I'm certain we shall arrive at a befitting name for little Euros 310 here. Now let us take a moment or two to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>think<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> so that we might draw inspiration from our surroundings.
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_EUROS310_000_047<tab>!

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_SYSTEM_000_048<tab>Water droplets gleam like sun-kissed jewels on Euros 310's well-hydrated skin. You wager that were you to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>think<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> about it now, you might be able to come up with a name.
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>Euros 310's beady eyes appear to scan its surroundings.

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_051<tab>It is a creature that bears a strong resemblance to a plant... So, perhaps, Planticus? Hm, it's also a deal similar to a succulent... A<var 1A 02 /var>ha<var 1A 01 /var>! I've got it! Succulem! ...Oh goodness gracious, no. That's just foul.

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_052<tab>I am afraid I am quite at a loss for names beyond the paltry few I've offered. Perhaps you could provide a fresh perspective? What is it you find most endearing about this creation?
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_A3_000_001<tab>Its sleek green skin.
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_A3_000_002<tab>Its beady eyes.
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_A3_000_003<tab>Its spiky head.
TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_054<tab><gasp> Oh, that did the trick. Your astute observational skills have stirred my imagination, for I've come up with a very worthy name!

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_055<tab>I must return to Poieten Oikos at once, and ensure that no other creation shares this nomenclature. You will not be too far behind, yes? You are due a suitable gift for the help you've provided, after all.

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_060<tab>I must say I greatly enjoyed our time together. I believe nothing cultivates creativity quite like the sharing of ideas. So often I am forced to work alone, and though it pains me to admit this, it's not much fun to ponder in the silence of one's own company.

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_061<tab>In fact, I credit you for the name I devised. All that remains now is to go to Peripeteia Krystalline, ensure there is no record of any similarly named creation, and appoint Euros 310 with its official name.

TEXT_AKTKZH017_04312_DENOMINATOR04312_000_062<tab>And should I hit another metaphorical roadblock, I shall remember to always ponder while perambulating! Thank you again for your help in this matter. It was most appreciated.
